purpose: Entry point for Smart Account interaction
key_features: User operations (ERC-4337); Multi-signature transactions; Off-chain and on-chain messaging
use_cases: Simplified account deployment; Transaction flow management; ERC-4337 integration

purpose: Direct engagement with Safe Smart Accounts
key_features: Create and configure accounts; Transaction signing and execution; Battle-tested security; Transaction batching; Owner management
use_cases: Safe account deployment; Transaction execution workflows; Signature handling; Configuration updates

purpose: Interface with Safe Transaction Service API
key_features: Transaction sharing among signers; Account configuration retrieval; Transaction history access; Off-chain signature collection
use_cases: Propose and collect signatures; Retrieve Safe information; Coordinate multi-sig workflows

key_features: ERC-4337 integration; Gelato-powered gasless experiences; Sponsored transactions; ERC-20 fee payment
use_cases: Pay fees with native or ERC-20 tokens; Sponsored transactions; ERC-4337 integration

purpose: Common types for Safe Core SDK packages
key_features: TypeScript type definitions
use_cases: Consistent typing across SDK ecosystem

purpose: Main contract with core Safe logic
key_features: Signature verification; Transaction execution; Owner management; Module management; Fallback handler
use_cases: Used by all Safe proxies via delegation

key_features: Delegatecall to Singleton; Reduced deployment costs; Smaller bytecode
use_cases: Each user deploys minimal proxy for their Safe account

key_features: Add/remove/replace owners; Set signature threshold; Configure confirmations
use_cases: Multi-signature account management

key_features: Execute transactions via modules; Automation; Security enhancements; Custom logic
use_cases: Allowance limits; Account recovery; ERC-4337; Passkey auth

key_features: Check transaction validity; Reject based on custom logic; Additional security
use_cases: Transaction filtering and validation

key_features: Execute transactions within allowance without multi-sig
use_cases: Daily spending limits without full multi-sig approval

key_features: Recover Safe access if credentials lost
use_cases: Account recovery workflows

key_features: Enable account abstraction features
use_cases: User operations and account abstraction

key_features: Passkey-based authentication
use_cases: Biometric and hardware security key authentication

key_features: Transaction tracking; Off-chain signature collection; Multi-sig coordination; Transaction state queries
use_cases: Coordinate multi-sig operations; Track transaction history; Collect signatures

use_cases: Notify users of pending transactions and events

key_features: Route requests; Transform data; Aggregate from multiple services
use_cases: Unified API interface for clients

key_features: Store supported networks and chain-specific config
use_cases: Provide network configuration to other services

key_features: Send transactions on behalf of users
use_cases: Enable account abstraction without protocol changes

key_features: Aggregate UserOperations; Submit to EntryPoint
use_cases: Process multiple user operations efficiently
